programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?(n)

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder(n)

programme.title: Beaches
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Iris Rainer Dart, BEACHES chronicles the 30-year oil-and-water friendship between free-spirited Bronx Jew CC Bloom (Bette Midler) and uptight San Francisco WASP Hillary Essex (Barbara Hershey). The two meet as children and are reunited in the 1960s, when CC is a struggling singer and Hillary is trying to break free from her staid upbringing by becoming an activist. The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)(n)

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven

programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency

programme.desc: After a weeks-long flirtation over the Internet, a teenage girl lures a 32-year-old photographer she suspects of being a pedophile into a dangerous encounter - then turns the tables on her alleged would-be molester. Ellen Page and Patrick Wilson star in this unsettling psychological thriller with Sandra Oh

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

Stars Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City

programme.desc: Documentary that reveals Hollywood legend Marlon Brando entirely in his own words -- through exclusive access to the actor's extraordinary personal archive of unseen film footage and unheard audio recordings, comprising the definitive story of one of the most complex and influential actors of all time

programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself

programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: A Promise
programme.desc: A romantic drama set in Germany, just before World War I, about a married woman who falls in love with her husband's protégé but duty, war and the passage of time will test their devotion. Stars Alan Rickman and Rebecca Hall

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed

programme.title: Adult World
programme.desc: Satirical comedy about a naive college graduate who believes she's destined to be a great poet, but in the meantime must move back in with her parents and take a job at a sex shop, while she pursues a mentorship with a reclusive writer. Stars John Cusack

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Ben (Ben Affleck) has to get from New York to Savannah for his wedding. Everything is under control, until a young woman named Sarah (Sandra Bullock) literally falls into his life. Ben and Sarah's plane goes skidding off the runway and he inadvertently saves Sarah's life, only to find that he has inherited an unlikely travel companion. After being detained, derailed and disrobed, Ben realizes that he's developing a definite attraction to the sexy and impetuous Sarah and the feeling is decidedly mutual(n)

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star(n)

programme.title: The Elephant Man

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: An expert gambler is hired by the mob to run a casino in Vegas. He turns it into a huge success, but his homicidal best friend and his untrustworthy wife threaten to end his reign. (cc)

programme.desc: Oscars went to Robert Benton's script and Sally Field's portrait of a farm widow struggling to weather the Depression. Danny Glover, John Malkovich. Margaret: Lindsay Crouse. Wayne: Ed Harris. Viola: Amy Madigan. Frank: Yankton Hatten. (repeat) (cc)

programme.desc: After a gunslinger protects a singer from unwanted advances in a Wild West settlement, he's inspired to become the town's new law enforcement. (cc)

programme.desc: A master scam artist dedicates years to forging documents that will leave him the sole owner of the state of Arizona. (cc)

programme.desc: A self-centered European musician is idolized by a young Belgian woman with a serious heart condition. Though fond of her, the composer opts for marriage to her socialite cousin--and lives to regret the move. Joan Fontaine was nominated for Best Actress as the jilted woman. (cc)

programme.title: The Devil's Own
programme.desc: Joan Fontaine as a headmistress who, haunted by horrifying occult experiences in Africa, moves to a small English village, where she discovers supernatural terrors abound and one of her students is being sought as a voodoo sacrifice

programme.title: Until They Sail
programme.desc: In World War II New Zealand, a hardened U.S. marine officer who's responsible for investigating servicemen's requests to marry local girls, falls for a war widow with three sisters involved in their own romantic entanglements. (cc)

programme.title: Ivanhoe

programme.title: Doctor Zhivago
programme.desc: Restored version of David Lean's Oscar-winning love story, played out against the Russian Revolution. Omar Sharif, Julie Christie, Rod Steiger, Geraldine Chaplin, Tom Courtenay, Alec Guiness, Siobhan McKenna. Based on the novel by Boris Pasternak. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Impreska

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.sub-title: Big Trouble in Little Norrisville/Winner Takes Ball.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: After discovering his family is moving because Norrisville is getting too dangerous, Randy decides he must defeat Cyborg Julian and make his town safe so that his parents will change their mind

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Lolo runs for class president, so Spencer has to run against her. Then, Spencer foolishly seeks Billy's help when competing with Lolo to sell sweets for charity

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Billy unwittingly turns a vintage Billy doll into a voodoo doll. Then, he helps Rajeev win Lolo's affection by teaching him one of his songs which has love powers

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat's Kommander thinks Captain Blasteroid is the real defender of the Earth, and plans to destroy a store full of fans dressed as the captain he sees as a threat. Then, Kat builds a Rat-Ray gun to turn Coop into a rat

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop discovers there a big space inside the house on Kat's scratching post and goes inside to investigate, but ends up being thrown away with the rubbish. Later, Dad, Millie and Coop are accused of being aliens when Kat's droid appears on a military radar

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Howard suddenly becomes evil and Randy tries to get him back to normal. Then, Randy's reaction to a fan opens him up to attack

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: When Howie Met Randy/Bro Money Bro Problems'.
programme.desc: Double bill. In a flashback episode, six-year-old Randy tries to convince new kid Howard that Norrisville has a Ninja by sneaking out of daycare and into the high school. Then, when Randy lets Howard sell used Ninja weapons for cash, the boys unwittingly sell them to Viceroy, who uses the weapons to build the Ninja's ultimate foe

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Ozzy plays a trick on Rafik, who thinks Boyster is to blame. Then, Boyster enters a Mexican wrestling match to get money to buy Lola a Mother's Day gift

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys decide to build a restaurant and name it Chez Platypus

programme.title: Hulk and the Agents of Smash

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace loses a present from Jeremy, so asks Phineas and Ferb to recreate it using information from her subconscious. The boys make ants grow to giant size

programme.desc: The Freemakers return to the Wheel to retrieve a special part. However, all they find are Graballa the Hutt and his team of bounty hunters

programme.sub-title: The Belly of the Beast/Moon Farm.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace suffers a bizarre accident and has her personality split in two, and the boys devise a game using a live television feed when they are stuck at home with colds

programme.desc: Double-bill. The boys make themselves small enough to fit anywhere by using their shrinking machine, and Candace does the same when she shows it to Mum.
